description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING 

--------------- 
DISCLAIMER: This app is under constant development to provide support for as many FTP servers as possible. For this reason, you should download Simple FTP Client Lite & test your servers before buying the Pro version. Refunds will not be provided if you buy this app without testing your server(s) using the Lite version first. Additionally I am not responsible for any damage that you cause to files, webOS devices, FTP servers, or any other electronic equipment used in conjunction with Simple FTP Client . 
--------------- 

Simple FTP Client is the first FTP Client for webOS. It allows you to connect to any compatible FTP server (includes a number of UNIX and Windows FTP servers) and transfer files using an intuitive panel-based interface. It is built with speed in mind, so once you've added your first server, you can start transferring files in just a few taps. Transfers are just as fast as using a desktop client, with all the benefits of portability. 

Simple FTP Client also includes a: full featured local file manager with native file handling, a full text editor that allows you to update your files anywhere, and the ability to attach files to emails.

NOTE: This is the Pro edition of Simple FTP Client.

--------------- 

UPDATES 

1.0.0: Initial release.
